reviewText: This video shows the behind the scenes activities  of the Mormon Tabernacle Choir.  The segment of their tour in Norman, Oklahoma brought back fond memories. I was there!

There are better DVDs to get. This had some interesting moments but overall it's not worth the price. There's not really that much by way of insight about the Choir and other DVD's have better performance footage. America's Choir documentary is more interesting (and that had it's dry moments).
